Package io.github.projectunified.craftitem.spigot.skull

Class PaperSkullHandler

java.lang.Object
io.github.projectunified.craftitem.spigot.skull.PaperSkullHandler
public class PaperSkullHandler extends Object
Skull handler for Paper servers using the Paper-specific PlayerProfile API.

Uses Paper's faster PlayerProfile implementation compared to Bukkit's standard API. Caches PlayerProfile instances to avoid recreation for repeated textures.

Implementation Details:

  • Uses Bukkit.createProfile() to create profiles (Paper-optimized)
  • Uses ProfileProperty for direct property assignment
  • Caches profiles for performance optimization

    • setSkullByPlayer

      public void setSkullByPlayer(org.bukkit.inventory.meta.SkullMeta meta, org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player)
      Sets skull texture using an OfflinePlayer. Results are cached to avoid recreating profiles for the same player.
      Parameters:
      meta - the SkullMeta to modify
      player - the OfflinePlayer

    • setSkullByURL

      public void setSkullByURL(org.bukkit.inventory.meta.SkullMeta meta, URL url)
      Sets skull texture from a URL using the PlayerProfile API. Results are cached to avoid recreating profiles for the same URL.
      Parameters:
      meta - the SkullMeta to modify
      url - the texture URL

    • setSkullByBase64

      public void setSkullByBase64(org.bukkit.inventory.meta.SkullMeta meta, String base64)
      Sets skull texture from Base64-encoded texture data. Results are cached to avoid recreating profiles for the same Base64 string.
      Parameters:
      meta - the SkullMeta to modify
      base64 - the Base64-encoded texture data

    • getSkullValue

      public String getSkullValue(org.bukkit.inventory.meta.SkullMeta meta)
      Extracts the skull texture value (Base64 data) from SkullMeta. Searches for the textures property in the PlayerProfile.
      Parameters:
      meta - the SkullMeta to query
      Returns:
      the Base64 texture value, or empty string if not found

    • setSkullByName

      default void setSkullByName(org.bukkit.inventory.meta.SkullMeta meta, String name)
      Sets skull texture using a player name. Uses Bukkit's OfflinePlayer lookup mechanism.
      Parameters:
      meta - the SkullMeta to modify
      name - the player name

    • setSkullByUUID

      default void setSkullByUUID(org.bukkit.inventory.meta.SkullMeta meta, UUID uuid)

      Parameters:

      uuid - the player UUID

    • setSkullByURL

      default void setSkullByURL(org.bukkit.inventory.meta.SkullMeta meta, String url)
      Sets skull texture using a URL string. The URL string is converted to a URL object.
      Parameters:
      meta - the SkullMeta to modify
      url - the texture URL as a string
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the URL string is invalid
